mapper.select: SELECT sum(bid_money) as sumBidMoney FROM b_bid_info

SELECT bid.id, CONCAT( SUBSTRING( u.phone FROM 1 FOR 3 ), "******", SUBSTRING( u.phone FROM 10 FOR 2 ) ) AS phone, bid.bid_money, DATE_FORMAT( bid.bid_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s" ) AS bid_time FROM b_bid_info bid JOIN u_user u ON bid.uid = u.id WHERE bid.prod_id = #{prodId} ORDER BY bid.bid_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
